lines.text: Hm, let's see... maybe he died from Mass Arrest Momentum somehow?
Like... hm. I was going to say maybe it stopped his heartbeat, which would've killed him, but...
If the spell description says you can still see and think, it's probably not fatal.
It's definitely possible that it was used to <c=#FF00FF>immobilize him</c> so that <c=#FF00FF>something else</c> could kill him, but...
You've still gotta figure out exactly what took him out.
